title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze user behavior, product performance, and key business metrics. Build dashboards using Tableau/Looker/Power BI. Clean and structure large datasets. Work with SQL, Python, or R to extract and analyze data. Conduct A/B testing and collaborate with product and marketing teams.

title: Senior Data Analyst
description: Dive deep into clinical data to uncover trends and insights. Build analyses to highlight opportunities for care improvement. Design dashboards for executives. Strong SQL, data wrangling, and healthcare data experience preferred.

title: Business Systems Analyst III
description: Review design proposals, align systems with business needs, consult on projects, and develop functional requirements. Strong experience with large-scale systems, SDLC, documentation, change management, and process flows.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Manage financial reporting, budgeting, and variance analysis. Collaborate with accounting teams, analyze cost areas, and deliver financial insights. Strong Excel skills and FP&A experience required.

title: Senior Operations Associate
description: Lead user activation and retention projects. Analyze campaign performance, create SQL-based reports, build processes, and collaborate cross-functionally. Requires strong analytics and communication skills.

title: Real Estate Investment Analyst
description: Prepare financial models using Excel/Argus, perform sensitivity analyses, evaluate investments, and create investor reports. Requires understanding of real estate finance and strong Excel abilities.

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze historical data, forecast sales, manage inventory planning, and create financial insights. Strong Excel and communication skills required with 6+ years BA experience.

title: Marketing Data Analyst
description: Analyze marketing funnel metrics, build dashboards, run A/B tests, and identify campaign optimization opportunities using SQL and Google Analytics.

title: Product Analyst
description: Evaluate product performance, build experiments, analyze feature usage, and provide recommendations to product managers. Requires SQL and analytics experience.

title: Operations Analyst
description: Optimize fulfillment workflows, build KPI dashboards, analyze delivery metrics, and improve operational efficiency.

title: Data Scientist
description: Build predictive models, analyze datasets, deploy ML pipelines, and communicate insights to stakeholders. Requires Python, ML, and SQL.

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description: Create BI dashboards, automate reporting, maintain data pipelines, and support data governance initiatives.

title: Financial Planning Analyst
description: Support budgeting cycles, run variance analysis, assist in forecasting, and prepare monthly reporting packages.

title: HR Data Analyst
description: Analyze workforce trends, build HR dashboards, support hiring analytics, and optimize compensation reporting models.

title: Risk Analyst
description: Analyze risk models, evaluate credit reports, assist with regulatory compliance, and prepare risk assessment summaries.

title: Supply Chain Analyst
description: Monitor supply chain KPIs, optimize vendor performance, and conduct cost reduction analyses.

title: Sales Operations Analyst
description: Analyze sales data, build Salesforce dashboards, manage CRM reporting, and identify revenue opportunities.

title: Customer Insights Analyst
description: Analyze customer behavior, segment audiences, and generate insights for personalization strategies.

title: Strategy Analyst
description: Support strategic planning, analyze market trends, evaluate business initiatives, and build financial models.

title: Operations Research Analyst
description: Apply optimization techniques, simulation modeling, and advanced analytics to improve business processes.

title: Junior Data Analyst
description: Clean datasets, build reports, assist senior analysts, and support SQL/Python-based analysis tasks.

title: Reporting Analyst
description: Build automated healthcare reports, validate data quality, and support regulatory reporting requirements.

title: Compensation Analyst
description: Analyze salary benchmarks, maintain compensation databases, and support pay structure development.

title: E-commerce Analyst
description: Analyze web traffic, optimize product listings, run pricing experiments, and improve conversion rates.

title: Corporate Finance Analyst
description: Work on mergers & acquisitions analyses, prepare financial statements, build valuation models, and support investment decisions.
